```{python}
import pandas as pd
import polars as pl
import duckdb
```



```{python}
nocs = pl.read_csv('../data/nocs.csv')
nocs.head()
```


```{python}
athletes = pl.read_csv('../data/athletes.csv')
athletes.head()
```

# Inner joins

```{python}
query = """
SELECT * FROM nocs
"""
duckdb.sql(query)
```

```{python}
query = """
SELECT * FROM athletes
"""
duckdb.sql(query)
```


```{python}
query = """
SELECT l.*, r.name, r.country_code 
FROM nocs l
INNER JOIN 
athletes r
ON l.code = r.country_code
"""
duckdb.sql(query)
```
